mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, ID, REF, STEP, DEPTH, TITLE, CONTENT, WDATE, DEL, READCOUNT FROM BBS ORDER BY REF DESC, STEP ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BBS (SEQ,ID,REF,STEP,DEPTH,TITLE,CONTENT,WDATE,DEL,READCOUNT) VALUES( SEQ_BBS.nextval,#{id}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(REF),0)+1 FROM BBS), 0,0,#{title},#{content},SYSDATE,0,0)
